snippet: A panel of experts said tamoxifen and raloxifene may be worth taking to lower the risk of breast cancer despite the potential for serious side effects like blood clots and strokes.
abstract: Influential panel of experts says breast cancer drugs tamoxifen and raloxifene may be worth taking for healthy higher-risk women, despite potential for serious side effects like blood clots and strokes.
lead_paragraph: A panel of experts said tamoxifen and raloxifene may be worth taking to lower the risk of breast cancer despite the potential for serious side effects like blood clots and strokes.

headline.seo: Breast Cancer Drugs Urged for Healthy High-Risk Women
headline.main: Breast Cancer Drugs Urged for Healthy High-Risk Women
headline.print_headline: Panel’s Report Urges Breast Cancer Drugs for Healthy Higher-Risk Women

keywords.value: United States Preventive Services Task Force
keywords.name: organizations
